kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Take a look at `CMS.ContentEngine.StandardMediaDimensionsInfo`.
You can also query this data in the database if you want to verify it's what you're looking for.
```SQL SELET * FROM CMS_StandardMediaDimensions ```
You can follow the docs to see how to query for this data using [IInfoProvider\<T>](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/api/database-table-api#generic-provider-class-iinfoprovidertinfo).
If you want to populate a drop down in component properties with this data, take a look at our documentation for [Configure editing component state](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/customization/extend-the-administration-interface/ui-form-components/editing-components/configure-editing-component-state#example).
